header.header_text: Korean Language and TOPIK Learning Center located in Tashkent

hero.hero_title: Opportunity to study at South Korean universities with up to 100% scholarships
hero.hero_matn_1: We help you achieve TOPIK Level 6 in 5 months
hero.hero_matn_2: Gain a high TOPIK score and unlock opportunities to study and work in South Korea
hero.hero_btn: Sign up for a free lesson
hero.hero_text_2: Sign up for the first lesson for free!

home.home_title: TOPIK Academy is perfect for you if you:
home.home_text_1: Want to start speaking Korean in a short time
home.home_text_2: Want to learn Korean and build your career
home.home_text_3: Want to obtain a TOPIK certificate and win a scholarship to prestigious Korean universities
home.home_text_4: Want to go to South Korea for studying and working
home.home_text_5: Have an intermediate level of Korean and want to improve it
home.home_text_6: Have been studying for years without achieving results

model.model_title: Our students' results up to TOPIK 6

wrapper.wrapper_title: Opportunity to Win Up to 100% Scholarship at Korean Universities
wrapper.wrapper_text_1: The South Korean Government's Scholarship Program (GKS) offers international students the opportunity to receive up to a 100% full scholarship and a monthly stipend for undergraduate and graduate studies in Korea through the National Institute for International Education of Korea.
wrapper.wrapper_title_2: What the GKS Scholarship Offers You
wrapper.wrapper_text_2: The program covers travel expenses to and from Korea at the beginning and end of the program.
wrapper.wrapper_text_3: A one-time settlement allowance of 200,000 Korean Won (approximately 157 USD) is provided upon arrival in Korea.
wrapper.wrapper_text_4: The language course and university tuition fees are fully covered (only for masterâ€™s and doctoral students)... read more

number.number_title: We Assist Our Successful Graduates in Choosing Universities and Winning Scholarships
number.number_text_1: The TOPIK Academy consulting team will closely support you in selecting a university, obtaining a visa, and winning a scholarship.
number.number_text_2: Sign up for a free consultation to learn more!

close.close_text_2: An intensive course for those who want to master the Korean language in depth, 1.5 hours a day, 6 days a week.
close.close_text_4: Standard Korean language classes, 1.5 hours a day, 3 days a week.
close.close_text_6: For those who want to take individual lessons from a teacher, 1.5 hours a day, 3 days a week. Flexible schedule and personalized approach.

main.main_text_1: You will be taught by teachers with more than 4 years of experience and a TOPIK level 6.
main.main_text_2: We have free coworking zones for flexible studying, networking, and self-improvement.
main.main_text_3: The TOPIK academy team regularly organizes additional events for students.
main.main_text_4: Participate in the regularly organized trial exams to keep track of your progress.
main.main_text_5: If you face difficulties in understanding lessons, you will have a curator to help you.
main.main_text_6: We assist our successful graduates in obtaining visas, choosing universities, and winning scholarships for studying in South Korea.

section.section_text: Leave your contact information, and we will get in touch with you to answer all your questions.
